benchmark_details.name: ECKGBench: Benchmarking Large Language Models in E-commerce Leveraging Knowledge Graph
benchmark_details.overview: ECKGBench is a dataset specifically designed to evaluate the capacities of large language models (LLMs) in e-commerce knowledge, utilizing a standardized workflow for generating questions from a knowledge graph to ensure reliability and efficiency.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To bridge the evaluation gap for factuality assessment of large language models in e-commerce.

data.source: Large-scale e-commerce knowledge graph (ECKG) collected from Taobao.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the correctness of answers generated by LLMs compared to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better alignment with factuality in e-commerce knowledge.
methodology.baseline_results: Results based on evaluations of several advanced LLMs (e.g., GPT-4, Qwen2-max) demonstrating varying accuracy scores.
